tasks.name: Build Terminal-Based Model Marketplace Interface
tasks.description: Create the core marketplace interface with terminal aesthetics that can dynamically switch between SwaggyStacks (gaming) and ScientiaCapital (corporate) themes. Include advanced search, filtering, and model discovery capabilities.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Extend existing terminal components to support model browsing
2. Create model card components with organization-specific styling
3. Implement advanced search with filters (organization, model type, popularity)
4. Add pagination and infinite scroll for large model collections
5. Integrate real-time model statistics and deployment status
tasks.verificationCriteria: Marketplace loads successfully, displays models from both organizations, search and filtering work correctly, theme switching operates smoothly
tasks.analysisResult: Phase 2 Development Goals: Complete the dual-domain LLM platform infrastructure by building a terminal-themed model marketplace that integrates both SwaggyStacks and ScientiaCapital HuggingFace organizations. Focus on creating seamless authentication, model discovery, deployment capabilities, and end-to-end testing systems that support both developer-focused (retro gaming aesthetic) and enterprise-focused (professional corporate aesthetic) user experiences.
tasks.summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive model marketplace with terminal aesthetic. Created useModelSearch.ts hook for search and filtering logic, ModelCard.tsx component for individual model display with deployment capabilities, and ModelMarketplace.tsx main interface with theme switching between SwaggyStacks (gaming) and ScientiaCapital (enterprise) themes. Implemented marketplace page at /marketplace that demonstrates organization switching, ASCII art headers, and complete marketplace functionality. All verification criteria met: marketplace loads successfully, displays models from both organizations, search and filtering work correctly, and theme switching operates smoothly.

tasks.name: Implement HuggingFace Multi-Organization Authentication
tasks.description: Build secure authentication system that can handle both SwaggyStacks and ScientiaCapital tokens, with dynamic organization switching and API access management.

relatedFiles.description: HuggingFace API client with multi-org support

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create authentication context with multi-token support
2. Implement organization switching logic
3. Build secure token storage and retrieval
4. Add authentication error handling and retry mechanisms
5. Create authentication status indicators in the UI
tasks.verificationCriteria: Authentication works for both organizations, organization switching is seamless, API calls use correct tokens, error handling works properly
tasks.analysisResult: Phase 2 Development Goals: Complete the dual-domain LLM platform infrastructure by building a terminal-themed model marketplace that integrates both SwaggyStacks and ScientiaCapital HuggingFace organizations. Focus on creating seamless authentication, model discovery, deployment capabilities, and end-to-end testing systems that support both developer-focused (retro gaming aesthetic) and enterprise-focused (professional corporate aesthetic) user experiences.
tasks.summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive HuggingFace multi-organization authentication system. Created HuggingFaceAuthProvider context with secure token management, dynamic organization switching, and error handling. Built OrganizationSwitcher component with seamless UI switching between SwaggyStacks (gaming) and ScientiaCapital (enterprise) themes. Implemented HuggingFace API client with multi-org support, retry mechanisms, and robust error handling. Created comprehensive test page demonstrating authentication flow, organization switching, model discovery, and API integration. System now enables C-suite executives and developers to add their own HuggingFace tokens for instant access to private model collections, with MCP server integration for fine-tuning and LLM services.

tasks.name: Develop Model Discovery and API Integration
tasks.description: Create comprehensive model discovery system that fetches models from both HuggingFace organizations, with metadata enrichment, caching, and real-time updates.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Build HuggingFace API integration for model listing
2. Implement model metadata fetching and caching
3. Create organization-specific model filtering
4. Add model popularity and usage statistics
5. Implement real-time model availability checking
tasks.verificationCriteria: Models load from both organizations, metadata is complete and accurate, caching improves performance, real-time updates work
tasks.analysisResult: Phase 2 Development Goals: Complete the dual-domain LLM platform infrastructure by building a terminal-themed model marketplace that integrates both SwaggyStacks and ScientiaCapital HuggingFace organizations. Focus on creating seamless authentication, model discovery, deployment capabilities, and end-to-end testing systems that support both developer-focused (retro gaming aesthetic) and enterprise-focused (professional corporate aesthetic) user experiences.
tasks.summary: Successfully completed comprehensive model discovery and API integration system. Implemented useModels.ts hook with advanced caching, pagination, and authentication integration. Created useModelSearch.ts with real-time search, filtering, and sorting capabilities. Integrated modelDiscovery.ts service with HuggingFace API, sophisticated caching system using modelCache.ts, and complete TypeScript type definitions in types/models.ts. Updated ModelMarketplace.tsx to use new hooks with seamless organization switching and theme integration. All components now work together to provide a unified model discovery experience across both SwaggyStacks and ScientiaCapital organizations.
